$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_双界ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_FM_Pair,Face|I'm tired... Let's go back, Xander.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|H-hey, you two! Where are
